original_text: And when the feast was ended, as they were returning, the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem. His parents did not know it,
korean_text: 그 날들을 마치고 돌아갈 때에 아이 예수는 예루살렘에 머무셨더라 그 부모는 이를 알지 못하고

sentences.original_text: And when the feast was ended,
the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem.
His parents did not know it,
